author: Sudarsan Raghavan, Siobhán O'Grady, Isabelle Khurshudyan, Loveday Morris
title: Ukraine shrugged off predictions of war. Now it’s a mad dash to leave.
description: From Kharkiv and Kyiv to the Polish border, Ukrainian lives have been upended overnight.
content:
We fear its Russian, said Ludmila, 56.
We hope its Ukrainian, said Larisa, 42.
Story continues below advertisement
